rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A compact entrance hall that leads to the living spaces and garage. The design adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring a clear line of sight from the entrance.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with ample natural light; east-west alignment is maintained for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for informal dining and social gatherings. Ensures balanced energy distribution as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen layout with modern fixtures, placed in a position that avoids direct alignment with entrance according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor. The positioning is designed for easy access and minimal disturbance to living spaces.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space with proper lighting and ventilation; ideally positioned on the south side to foster concentration and productivity while maintaining Vastu balance.
